description:
Nitrux 3.8 distribution is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.12 and featuring various new and updated components. Here's what's new!

The post Nitrux 3.8 Released with Linux Kernel 6.12, Better Support for NVIDIA Users appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Nitrux 3.8 Released with Linux Kernel 6.12, Better Support for NVIDIA Users
